  • Constructor Details

    • Barrier

      public Barrier(float fltWorldX, float fltWorldY, float fltWidth, float fltHeight, BufferedImage biTexture, ObjectId id, ObjectHandler handler, SuperSocketMaster ssm)
      The constructor for a Barrier object
      Parameters:
      fltWorldX - The x coordinate of the object on the world coordinate system
      fltWorldY - The y coordinate of the object on the world coordinate system
      fltWidth - The width of the object
      fltHeight - The height of the object
      biTexture - The image texture of the object
      id - The ObjectId of the object
      handler - The ObjectHandler object used for accessing other objects
      ssm - The SuperSocketMaster object used for network communication
